messages.content: What nodes are included in ComfyUI_hus_utils?
The nodes included in ComfyUI_hus_utils are Fetch widget value, 3way Prompt Styler, Text Hash, Date Time Format, Batch State, and Debug Extra.
What does the Fetch widget value node do?

The Fetch widget value node retrieves the value of a widget named _widget_name_ from a node named _node_name_. If 'multiple' is 'no', it uses the first matching node, and if it is 'yes', it returns all as a concatenated string separated by a comma.
What is the purpose of the 3way Prompt Styler node?

The 3way Prompt Styler node loads prompt styles from a 'styles.csv' file in the source directory of this node. Each line in the file has four columns: _style name_, _prompt G_, _prompt L_ and _negative prompt_, which are used to adjust the respective inputs in the node.
What does the Text Hash node return?
The Text Hash node returns the first _length_ characters of the sha256 digest of the provided input.
What does the Date Time Format node do?
The Date Time Format node returns the current date and/or time in a format defined by the '_format_' parameter, using the strftime function.
What is the purpose of the Batch State node?

The Batch State node checks whether the state of the workflow (inputs and linking) has changed. It has three features: '_changed_' returns 1 if a change is detected, 0 otherwise, '_hash_' returns a hash of the current state, and '_count_' counts up every time the state is unchanged and resets to 0 on change.
What does the Debug Extra node do?
The Debug Extra node exposes some of the internal workings to aid in developing custom nodes.
What is an example of a workflow based on ComfyUI_hus_utils?

An example workflow based on ComfyUI_hus_utils is provided in the documentation, which creates filename prefixes as _prompt hash_-_prompt style_-_seed_-_model name_-_base {sampler, scheduler, steps, cfg}_-_refiner {sampler, scheduler, steps, cfg}_, and generates seeds in a fixed sequence that restarts every time any input is changed.
What are some dependencies of ComfyUI_hus_utils?
Dependencies of ComfyUI_hus_utils include nodes from WAS Node Suite, ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts, tinyterraNodes, and possibly others.
